data.name: Hit and Boom
data.detailed_description:
Hit and Boom is a top-down, skillshot-based Free-to-Play Cross Platform MOBA game that lets you experience the thrill of a battle with animalistic robots.

Choose from a variety of BoomBots, each one packed with a unique arsenal and different playstyles. Join the carnage yourself or with your friends, get ready for combat, and struggle to survive as the zone closes!

Easy to Master Gameplay


Why re-invent the wheel? Keep it simple, stupid! WASD controls, your ring finger on Q and with cursor-based aiming; you have total control over your BoomBot. You focus on not getting flamed and watch out for the zone!

There’s No “Right Way” to Play


Whether you are a tanky panda or an assassin mantis; there’s no single right way to play Hit and Boom. Customize your weapons, skin, and many more features to make the game yours.

Teamwork Makes the Dream Work


You can play on your own, there’s nothing wrong with that. We love gun-slinging Mavericks but if you want to make things even more interesting; how about you gather up your team, fight for your belonged mythology, dive deep into the lore, and become the ruler of the Arena with your friends!

data.short_description: Explore the mystical Hit and Boom Arena - A thrilling fusion between MOBA and Battle Royale. Choose your BoomBot, master its abilities, unleash power and grab your loot! Bring your friends for multiplayer action or sling your guns solo...Only the finest of them all survive to the end!
